page.title: 05HOME LIFE. 3.
page.content: Family life:-Sunday.Michelle Bradley. On a Sunday we get up at 8.00 a.m..We have breakfast and I get ready for church.I go out of the house at about 9.40 a.m. and walk up to church with Helen.Mom starts to cook the dinner,Scott goes out to play on his bike and dad washes the car.I come back from church at 11 o'clock.I go outside to play .At 12 o'clock we all come in and have our dinner.I do the washing up after and mum dries up.I stay in for half an hour and listen to WHAM.Afterwards if the weather is nice I go out and play with Helen,my friend.Icome in and have a shower and wash my hair.I have my tea and a drink of milk,then I watch T.V. fo a little while and go to bed about 8.30 p.m..
